name: create-node-ms
description: A generator for microservices with Clean Architecture in Node

scripts.dev: yarn dev:prepare && node -r ts-node/register ./src/index.ts node-ms -p ../create-node-ms-junk --verbose  --projectName test-service -e test
scripts.dev:nse: yarn dev:prepare && node -r ts-node/register ./src/index.ts nse -p ../create-node-ms-junk -pn serverless-express --verbose
scripts.dev:nsl: yarn dev:prepare && node -r ts-node/register ./src/index.ts nsl -p ../create-node-ms-junk -pn serverless-lambda --verbose
scripts.test:e2e: docker build --no-cache -t create-node-ms-e2e-test . && docker run create-node-ms-e2e-test

author: WandersonAlves <wandersonalvesferreira2012@gmail.com>
